name: Definitely Real Football
description:
Play normal football against a friend. First to 3 goals wins!

Made for TrainJam 2017 - a train ride from Chicago to San Francisco in roughly 52 hours - based on the theme 'unexpected anticipation'.

Art: Jonathan "Ellian" Rousseau

Music: Ariel Contreras-Esquivel

Code: Connor Halford, Julien Berthou, Alex Dixon
